Items.name: Tutorial
text: Hoot~ Welcome players to Glade Party! My name is Kosmowl, and I am the guardian of our forest!
I have called you all here to aid us with many environmental problems that have been happening lately...
Without you, our community will be left with no water to drink, no air to breathe and no home to live in.
Press <sprite index= 0>to roll the dice and to advance along the board. There are many shortcuts you can take to go somewhere faster!
There are Coin Tiles that give you Coins,
Luck Tiles that give you good rewards
And Penalty Tiles that make something bad happen...
There are also Shop Tiles where you can buy items!
Warp Tiles that help you get around faster in the board
And Minigame Tiles that will allow you to play a random minigame to get more Coins.
At last, there are Event Tiles, the main objective of the game!
When landing on an Event Tile, you can talk to that area’s guardian and donate your Coins to prevent environmental disasters from happening.
The player who donates the most to an area will receive a Bonus, which will give you great help during your stay at Glade Party.
Each player can have a maximum of 2 bonuses, and you can steal them from each other by donating even more Coins!
At the end of the game, these Bonuses will turn into Contribution Points, the main collectible of the game!
When an active event is present somewhere, donate Coins to the guardian of that area to put an end to the disaster and get 2Contribution Points.
Hoot~ And that’s all the rules, my friends! Compete with each other to be the best contributor in each area and help preserve the wonderful forest that is Glade Party!

Items.name: LuckTile
text: How lucky! You landed on a Luck Tile! You get a random Item.
Lucky!~ You landed on a Luck Tile. You get x Coins.

Items.name: PenaltyTile
text: Awn... you landed on a Penalty Tile... You lose x Coins.
Welp, you landed on a Penalty Tile. You lose x Coins and everyone else gets some of it.
Dang it! You landed on a Penalty Tile. Go back x tiles.

Items.name: CoinTile
text: You landed on a Coin Tile! You get x Coins.

Items.name: ShopTileEnter
text: Welcome welcome! Please, feel free to choose whatever you want for a fair price...
Welcome again! Don't hesitate, please choose something!
Welcome! Many good items for you to buy here!

Items.name: ShopTileExit
text: Come again!
See you soon!
Bye bye~

Items.name: MinigameTile
text: Wohoo! You landed on a Minigame Tile! Let's go!
Minigame time! Everybody, let's go!

Items.name: WarpTile
text: You Landed on a Warp Tile. Do you want to pay x Coins to skip this area?

Items.name: PontesDonation
text: Hello, player. I'm Chareer, the guardian of the Shadowy Bridges.
Would you kindly help our population?

Items.name: PontesDonationSuccess
text: Thank you very much. Your service is much appreciated.
I congratulate you with this prize, for being the most contributor.

Items.name: PontesDonationFail
text: Thank you very much. Your service is appreciated.

Items.name: CogumelosDonation
text: Hello, I'm Squidogh! Welcome to the Mushroom City!
We're accepting any donations to prevent our population from danger!

Items.name: CogumelosDonationSuccess
text: Thank you very much!!! You really helped us!
Oh, and congratulations for being the best contributor! Here's your prize.

Items.name: CogumelosDonationFail
text: Thank you so much! This is going to help us a lot!

Items.name: JardimDonation
text: Oh hello, there! I'm Miss Granbie, CEO of the Giant Flowers Garden!
You know how important bees are for the environment, right? If you'd like, please donate to our area!

Items.name: JardimDonationSuccess
text: Oh my my, thank you very much! I can't thank you enough!
Here's a prize for being the most contributor to my area!

Items.name: JardimDonationFail
text: Oh dear, thank you! My bees are going to be very happy!
